metadata.synopsis: A merchant selling in the bazaar on the ground floor of Moonrise Tower. She is very interested in illithid-tainted blood from each race, which when traded grants a different kind of potion as a reward. The player can also learn her house's origins - and the fact that she's here to research the illithids.For nodes marked as OOM AND COM are in their own dialog fileFor nodes not marked as OOM or COM the dialog will have these speakers:1. Araj2. Group_Players (that might include Astarion since the default dialog and AOM version are pretty much the same).

0.speaker: Araj Oblodra
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

27.speaker: Araj Oblodra
27.text: Welcome back, True Soul! You've come in the spirit of trade, I hope?
27.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

74.speaker: Araj Oblodra
74.text: Araj Oblodra, trader in blood and the sanguineous arts. But you, True Soul...
74.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

123.speaker: Araj Oblodra
123.text: I read about your kind for so many years, but never thought I'd find one in real life. And to find such a fine specimen...
123.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

51.speaker: Araj Oblodra
51.text: You're really a vampire? At least one of their spawn...
51.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

86.speaker: Player
86.text: Don't worry, we're all friends under the Absolute. I won't bite.
86.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

24.speaker: Araj Oblodra
24.text: Oh I'd prefer if you did.
24.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

12.speaker: Araj Oblodra
12.text: Do you have a name, spawn?
12.context: CinematicNodeContext: she turns back to Astarion

91.speaker: Player
91.context: InternalNodeContext: cut off before he can finish speaking

65.speaker: Araj Oblodra
65.text: Good. Now, Astarion, I've dreamt of being bitten by a vampire since I was a young girl.

89.speaker: Player
89.text: I'm sorry? You want to be bitten?

50.speaker: Araj Oblodra
50.text: To feel your life's blood slipping away? To dance on the edge between life and death? Yes, I want it.

121.speaker: Araj Oblodra
121.text: I'll even compensate you - a potion of legendary power that forever increases the strength of the one who consumes it.

101.speaker: Araj Oblodra
101.text: It's not for sale, but it's yours if you bite me.

68.speaker: Araj Oblodra
68.text: Excuse me? This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity and you're squandering it.

119.speaker: Araj Oblodra
119.text: How unfortunate. But if you won't take my blood, then perhaps I could have yours?

94.speaker: Araj Oblodra
94.text: Just a little, I promise. I have a 'special offer' of sorts for True Souls. It might interest you.

14.speaker: Araj Oblodra
14.text: Speak to me again if you'd like to hear more. I'll be waiting.

84.speaker: Araj Oblodra
84.text: Araj Oblodra, trader in all things occult. A very great pleasure to meet you, True Soul.
84.context: NodeContext: Chirpy and confident - she's standing in the heart of darkness but unfazed. (Araj Oblodra = a-RADJ o-BLOD-ruh)

42.speaker: Araj Oblodra
42.text: Should you be interested, I have a particular offer I'd like to make.
42.context: NodeContext: Taking a moment to size us up to see if she wants to offer us this deal - resolves she does

53.speaker: Player
53.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - we're getting on to the topic she cares most about. States her strange request plainly.

15.speaker: Player
15.text: I just want to see your normal stock for now.
15.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - we're getting on to the topic she cares most about. States her strange request plainly.

114.speaker: Player
114.text: Let's hear about this special offer of yours.
114.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - we're getting on to the topic she cares most about. States her strange request plainly.

100.speaker: Araj Oblodra
100.text: Put plainly - I'd like your blood. A vial of True Soul's blood, specifically.
100.context: NodeContext: Satisfied - we're getting on to the topic she cares most about. States her strange request plainly.

31.speaker: Araj Oblodra
31.text: With one drop, I can brew a rather potent potion for you. The rest, I keep for myself.
31.context: NodeContext: Pleasant - this is of course a perfectly normal thing to offer

118.speaker: Player
118.text: And what exactly are you planning to do with your share?
118.context: NodeContext: Shrugging - she doesn't want to to be drawn on her true motive. (Oblodra = o-BLOD-ruh)

78.speaker: Araj Oblodra
78.text: Research, naturally. We Oblodras are simply curious by nature.
78.context: NodeContext: Shrugging - she doesn't want to to be drawn on her true motive. (Oblodra = o-BLOD-ruh)

43.speaker: Narrator
43.text: *Realisation washes over you. Every drow knows of the purge of House Oblodra - but you remember the whispers of why.*

44.speaker: Narrator
44.text: *Among the many crimes tallied against them - their reckless experimentation with illithid breeding-stock.*

115.speaker: Player
115.text: *You realise why the name rings familiar: House Oblodra was purged a century ago by an alliance of rival drow houses.*

67.speaker: Araj Oblodra
67.text: *You realise why the name rings familiar: House Oblodra was purged a century ago by an alliance of rival drow houses.*

59.speaker: Narrator
59.text: *You realise why the name rings familiar: House Oblodra was purged a century ago by an alliance of rival drow houses.*

32.speaker: Player
32.text: It's not 'True Soul' blood you want. It's illithid-tainted blood.
32.context: NodeContext: Wicked grin - we've just revealed ourselves to be an even more valuable asset than she thought

61.speaker: Araj Oblodra
61.text: ...'Blessed' by the Absolute, but not blinded by it? Now I simply must study you.
61.context: NodeContext: Wicked grin - we've just revealed ourselves to be an even more valuable asset than she thought

106.speaker: Araj Oblodra
106.text: The beings you speak of have no use for gods - and yet here we stand in a church of their making.
106.context: NodeContext: Unfazed, happy - proposing a deal she knows we'll take.

112.speaker: Araj Oblodra
112.text: Unless they are not the makers, but simply the means. Wouldn't that be a secret worth knowing?
112.context: NodeContext: Unfazed, happy - proposing a deal she knows we'll take.

55.speaker: Araj Oblodra
55.text: So let me adjust my offer. Your blood and your silence in exchange for the potions I mention - and a tidy pile of gold besides.
55.context: NodeContext: Unfazed, happy - proposing a deal she knows we'll take.

87.speaker: Player
87.text: This is blasphemy. My blood is sacred.
87.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and excited - she's genuinely curious to see what our blood will do

18.speaker: Araj Oblodra
18.text: Now, now. A True Soul ought to know their doctrine. I've picked a little up in my time here.

11.speaker: Araj Oblodra
11.text: 'Many hearts, one soul' - isn't that how the blessing goes? We are all one under the Absolute.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: What kind of potion can you make?
30.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and excited - she's genuinely curious to see what our blood will do

127.speaker: Araj Oblodra
127.text: No idea! But it will be unique to you - your blood essence and the Absolute's blessing intertwined.
127.context: NodeContext: Cheerful and excited - she's genuinely curious to see what our blood will do

58.speaker: Araj Oblodra
58.text: We can learn exactly what that means together, hm?

36.speaker: Player
36.context: NodeContext: The 'And...' is leading to her giving us an additional item

125.speaker: Araj Oblodra
125.text: Just a little prick and it's all over. Close your eyes.
125.context: NodeContext: The 'And...' is leading to her giving us an additional item

37.speaker: Araj Oblodra
37.text: Just a little prick and it's all over. Close your eyes.
37.context: NodeContext: The 'And...' is leading to her giving us an additional item

21.speaker: Araj Oblodra
21.text: A little pain for a lot of gold. And...
21.context: NodeContext: The 'And...' is leading to her giving us an additional item

83.speaker: Araj Oblodra
83.text: Ever since I was a young girl I have dreamt of being bitten by a vampire.

113.speaker: Araj Oblodra
113.text: And now here I stand before one. Can you make my dream come true?

124.speaker: Araj Oblodra
124.text: I'll even compensate you - a potion of legendary power that forever increases the strength of the one who consumes it.

33.speaker: Araj Oblodra
33.text: It's not for sale, but it's yours if you bite me.

2.context: CinematicNodeContext: Astarion bites into her neck, she is very clearly enjoying it. To Astarion the blood tastes foul, though.

13.speaker: Araj Oblodra
13.context: CinematicNodeContext: Being bittenNodeContext: Being bitten by a vampire, having an AMAZING experience

62.speaker: Narrator
62.text: *As her blood seeps between your lips, you realise something's off. Her blood is rancid, tainted by unnatural experiments.*
62.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overcome by the wretched taste of her blood, Astarion breaks off his bite, turns away from Araj, and vomits up the blood he was drinking.

9.speaker: Player
9.context: CinematicNodeContext: Overcome by the wretched taste of her blood, Astarion breaks off his bite, turns away from Araj, and vomits up the blood he was drinking.

1.speaker: Araj Oblodra
1.context: CinematicNodeContext: Rubbing her neck where Astarion bit herNodeContext: Rubbing her neck where Astarion bit her

120.speaker: Araj Oblodra
120.text: I feel exquisite though - so here's my part of the bargain.

6.speaker: Araj Oblodra
6.text: I hope you find it as satisfying as I found this.

90.speaker: Araj Oblodra
90.text: It was everything I imagined. And then more. I'll be able to put this to good use.

56.speaker: Araj Oblodra
56.text: To feel your life's blood slipping away? To dance on the edge between life and death? Yes, I want it.

46.speaker: Araj Oblodra
46.text: Very well, if that's your answer. But you know where to find me if you change your mind.

29.speaker: Araj Oblodra
29.text: There we are. All of your very best traits in a bottle. Use it well!

40.speaker: Araj Oblodra
40.text: And if I may - would you have a moment to discuss another more personal matter.

117.speaker: Araj Oblodra
117.text: Truth be told, I heard tell of your coming before you arrived. Ketheric's dogs prowl far and wide round the Tower.

63.speaker: Araj Oblodra
63.text: I know you travel with a delightful night-walker in your retinue.

122.speaker: Araj Oblodra
122.text: Please. I have a proposal for him. I will reward you both, handsomely.

92.speaker: Player
92.text: My vampiric friend? Sure, I can bring him here.

48.speaker: Araj Oblodra
48.text: I- I must prepare myself for his arrival...

103.speaker: Araj Oblodra
103.text: I will speak of it when he is here. Not before. But it will be to your advantage, I promise.

16.speaker: Player
16.text: You aren't working for Cazador, are you?

54.speaker: Araj Oblodra
54.text: That is not a name which has ever passed my lips. I am a friend to you, I wish to be a friend to him.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: I'm not certain I'll have time.

102.speaker: Araj Oblodra
102.text: Don't say such a thing. Don't dash my hope.

64.speaker: Araj Oblodra
64.text: Ah, well... if you don't mind me saying, you don't look entirely well.
64.context: NodeContext: We've agreed to let her draw blood, but our health is too low. She's trying to tell us we look terrible, but politely

25.speaker: Araj Oblodra
25.text: Rest and return. I'll feel better buying your blood when I know you can actually spare it.

72.speaker: Player
72.text: Keep your gold. I want to see what the cult does to non-believers.
72.context: NodeContext: Regretful, but otherwise unfazed by our threat

132.speaker: Araj Oblodra
132.text: That, I cannot allow. For either of us.
132.context: NodeContext: Regretful, but otherwise unfazed by our threat

131.speaker: Araj Oblodra
131.text: I have a project to complete - and you are far too unique a specimen to risk.
131.context: CinematicNodeContext: She bows at the end (disappears in gameplay immediately after)NodeContext: Nodding to herself, resolving reluctantly on  leaving us for now lest we expose her. Bows at end (she simply disappears a moment later)

133.speaker: Araj Oblodra
133.text: If you can't be reasonable, I'll just have to observe your development from afar. For now.
133.context: CinematicNodeContext: She bows at the end (disappears in gameplay immediately after)NodeContext: Nodding to herself, resolving reluctantly on  leaving us for now lest we expose her. Bows at end (she simply disappears a moment later)

96.speaker: Player
96.text: If it'll help me vanquish my foes - fine.

17.speaker: Araj Oblodra
17.text: Well - it'll certainly do something, my most noble vindicator.

81.speaker: Player
81.text: Blood rituals? Unnatural heresy. I will not.

20.speaker: Araj Oblodra
20.text: 'Unnatural' - are we not all one under the Absolute, True Soul? Surely there's nothing more natural than sharing our resources.

104.speaker: Player
104.text: I'm not sure - my blood is exceptionally sought after.

110.speaker: Araj Oblodra
110.text: Well, that's why we're trading, no? I assure you, the potions are more than worth their weight.

109.speaker: Player
109.text: There is malice in this blood. It boils, churns, and whispers to me.

93.speaker: Player
93.text: Blood magic is an... unusual talent. Who gave it to you?

45.speaker: Araj Oblodra
45.text: No one gave it to me. Rather ironically, it runs in the bloodline. We Oblodras are naturally curious folk. Always have been.

126.speaker: Player
126.text: A Zhengyian blood mage? Unusual for you to be so far from Vaasa.

75.speaker: Araj Oblodra
75.text: Goodness, no. Nothing so unsanitary. The Oblodras clan practise their own form of blood alchemy.

47.speaker: Araj Oblodra
47.text: Very well. If there's anything else you need, let me know.

85.speaker: Player
85.text: I want to trade my blood for a potion.
85.context: NodeContext: Not interested, but still friendly. We've served our purpose but might send some friends her way

57.speaker: Player
57.text: I want to trade my blood for a potion.
57.context: NodeContext: Not interested, but still friendly. We've served our purpose but might send some friends her way

23.speaker: Araj Oblodra
23.text: Oh? I'm afraid I have quite enough for my purposes - from you, at least.
23.context: NodeContext: Not interested, but still friendly. We've served our purpose but might send some friends her way

77.speaker: Araj Oblodra
77.text: If you know of any other True Souls willing to aid my research, though, do send them my way.

111.speaker: Player
111.text: I hear you trade potions for True Soul blood.
111.context: NodeContext: Smiling - we've brought up the fact that her family is supposed to have been wiped out, she responds mildy, not being drawn

41.speaker: Player
41.text: Oblodra? That House was destroyed a century ago.
41.context: NodeContext: Smiling - we've brought up the fact that her family is supposed to have been wiped out, she responds mildy, not being drawn

7.speaker: Araj Oblodra
7.text: Thankfully, I wasn't in it at the time.
7.context: NodeContext: Smiling - we've brought up the fact that her family is supposed to have been wiped out, she responds mildy, not being drawn

71.speaker: Araj Oblodra
71.text: My cousins did like to boast about their view over the Clawrift. Now their bones decorate the bottom.
71.context: NodeContext: Sighing, a sad thing but can't be helped (she does not miss this extended family)

38.speaker: Player
38.text: I've changed my mind - I will bite you.

116.speaker: Araj Oblodra
116.text: Excellent! I knew you'd come around.
